meanings.definition: The quality or state of being impolite.
meanings.sent1: Her impoliteness towards the waiter upset everyone at the table.
meanings.sent2: His impoliteness was evident in the way he interrupted others while they were speaking.
meanings.sent3: Despite her impoliteness, he couldn't help but find her bluntness amusing.
meanings.sent4: The impoliteness of the storm was evident in the way it knocked down trees and power lines.
meanings.sent5: The impoliteness of the cat scratching the furniture made it clear it needed a scratching post.

meanings.definition: A rude or discourteous act or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The child's impoliteness towards his teacher resulted in a call to his parents.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the impoliteness of the customer who yelled at the cashier.
meanings.sent3: The impoliteness of the dog stealing food from the table was both frustrating and comical.
meanings.sent4: The impoliteness of the car cutting off other drivers on the road was dangerous.
meanings.sent5: The impoliteness of the student talking loudly during the lecture disrupted the entire class.
